Package adrenaline.server.model.constraints

Class SameDirectionConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.server.model.constraints.SameDirectionConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TargetsConstraint, TargetsGenerator
    public class SameDirectionConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements TargetsConstraint, TargetsGenerator
    This is used both as a targets constraint and as a targets generator. Checks whether the targets are in the same direction (coming from the player executing the action) or generates all the targets that are in the same direction.
